title: Sample-post
author: J. Diaz
htmlContent:
Lets start!

Blog articles API for Script Fuzz. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here. Random text goes here.

Requirements:

  1. Java 8 or higher
  2. MongoDB
  3. Maven 3.3.1 or higher

Usage:

  • Add Maven and Java to your PATH variable
  • Assuming you have MongoDB running on your system @port 27017
  • Clone this repository\n* Run: mvn install
  • A fat jar will found under the target directory

Code segment

public class Counter{

    private int count;

    public Counter()
    {
      count = 0;
    }

    public int getCount(){
      return count;
    }

    public void increment(){
      count++;
    }
}
